attributes.action: keep Mr Blair's Promise on Implementing a Cycle Route Network  in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When the Labour Government came back into power with Mr Blair many years ago there were great things afoot as far as the implementation of a cycle route network was concerned and it was indeed priority enough to be mentioned in public by Mt Blair himself. Why then are we not seeing such implementation in progress and as priority in an ever increasingly polluted  world where cycle riding due to the ever increasing volume of other traffic is being made more dangerous?
    Please sign this petition.
    Thank you.
